entry.title: Deep-Subdomains-Enumeration
entry.summary: What’s the need? A good subdomain enumeration will help you find those hidden/untouched subdomains, resulting lesser people finding bugs on that particular domain. Hence lesser duplicates. Finding applications running on hidden, forgotten(by the organization) sub-domains may lead to uncovering critical vulnerabilities. For large organizations, to find what services have they exposed to ...
